questions.question:
What will be the output of the following C code?

int main()
{
enum {ORANGE = 5, MANGO, BANANA = 4, PEACH};
printf("PEACH = %d\n", PEACH);
}

What will be the value of result after the following code snippet?

int arr[] = {2, 5, 7, 10};
int *p = arr;
int result = ++*p + ++*(p + 2);

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int a = 10, b = 5;
    a = a ^ b;
    b = a ^ b;
    a = a ^ b;
    printf("%d, %d", a, b);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

#define a 10
int main()
{
    const int a = 5;
    printf("a = %d\n", a);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

int main()
{
    int var = 010;
    printf("%d", var);
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    char str[] = "Hello";
    char *ptr = str;
    ptr += 2;
    printf("%s", ptr);
}

What will be the output of the following C function?

enum birds {SPARROW, PEACOCK, PARROT};
enum animals {TIGER = 8, LION, RABBIT, ZEBRA};
int main()
{
    enum birds m = TIGER;
    int k;
    k = m;
    printf("%d\n", k);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int a = 5, b = 7;
    printf("%d", a+++b);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int x = 5.3 % 2;
printf("Value of x is %d", x);
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int a = 5, b = 3;
    printf("%d", a > b ? a++ : b++);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int a = 3;
int b = ++a + a++ + --a;
printf("Value of b is %d", b);
}

What is the precedence of arithmetic operators (from highest to lowest)?

a) %, *, /, +, –
b) %, +, /, *, –
c) +, -, %, *, /
d) %, +, -, *, /

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int x = 1, y = 0, z = 5;
int a = x && y || z++;
printf("%d", z);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int x = 1, y = 0, z = 5;
int a = x && y && z++;
printf("%d", z);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int x = 97;
char y = x;
printf("%c\n", y);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

int main()
{
int a = 1, b = 1, c;
c = a++ + b;
printf("%d, %d", a, b);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

int main()
{
int a = 1, b = 1, d = 1;
printf("%d, %d, %d", ++a + ++a + a++, a++ + ++b, ++d + d++ + a++);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

int main()
{
int a = 10, b = 10;
if (a = 5)
b--;
printf("%d, %d", a, b--);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int x = 4, y, z;
y = --x;
z = x--;
printf("%d%d%d", x, y, z);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int a = 5, b = -7, c = 0, d;
d = ++a && ++b || ++c;
printf("\n%d%d%d%d", a, b, c, d);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main()
{
int a = -5;
int k = (a++, ++a);
printf("%d\n", k);
}
